Beaverton.Ole and Polly Oleson Farmhouse:
The Ole and Polly Oleson Farmhouse is a historic house located at 5430 SW Ames Way near Portland, Oregon. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places on February 22, 1991.


== Description and history ==
The house is a two-story pattern book Queen Anne/Eastlake style house situated on 1.31 acres overlooking Ames Way and Oleson Road in the Raleigh Hills area of Washington County.
